attributes.action: Paying to follow the law at work
attributes.additional_details: The law at work states that one one should have to pay to follow the law at work however hgv drivers are discriminated by being forced to follow the law yet have to pay to do so thus breaching the human rights bill under discrimination at work the uk and eu made this law and working time directive but yet we have to pay to park and follow the law as set down by the eu and uk yet in the eu the vast majority of motorway services are free to park in ! What's good for one is good for us all
